author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE WARNING IN EFFECT FOR BERMUDA AS MELISSA IS EXPECTED TO APPROACH THE ISLAND LATER TODAY AND TONIGHT... ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS TO INVESTIGATE MELISSA THIS MORNING...
summary: ...HURRICANE WARNING IN EFFECT FOR BERMUDA AS MELISSA IS EXPECTED TO APPROACH THE ISLAND LATER TODAY AND TONIGHT... ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS TO INVESTIGATE MELISSA THIS MORNING... As of 5:00 AM EDT Thu Oct 30 the center of Melissa was located near 25.8, -73.4 with movement NNE at 21 mph. The minimum central pressure was 968 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
